dc_title_s: Detroit and Vicinity.; Rand McNally & Co.'s Detroit;Rand McNally & Co.'s New Indexed Atlas of the World, Map of Detroit.
dc_description_s: North is oriented towards top right corner of the map. Title at head of map: Rand McNally & Co.'s Detroit. Includes two copyright dates, 1895 and 1898. Includes index on verso, "Rand, McNally & Co.'s Michigan" includes county seats and location of money order P.O. Inset: Detroit and Vicinity, includes Grosse Isle. Page no. 229-232. 1 map: col.; 52 x 69 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
